scripts.compile: npx tsc --build . && npx kui-babel && npx kui-prescan
scripts._watch: bash -c "npm run kill; export CSP_ALLOWED_HOSTS='http: https: data: filesystem: about: blob: ws: wss:'; kui-watch-webpack"
scripts.watch:webpack: bash -c "npm run pty:nodejs && KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true npm run _watch $WATCH_ARGS"
scripts.watch:electron: bash -c "npm run pty:electron && KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true TARGET=electron-renderer npm run _watch"
scripts.watch: bash -c "npm run kill; npm run compile && concurrently -n ES6,WEBPACK --kill-others 'npm run watch:source' 'npm run watch:electron'"
scripts.proxy: export PORT=8081; export KUI_USE_HTTP=true; npm run pty:nodejs && npx kui-run-proxy
scripts.build:electron:mac:amd64: KUI_KEEP_NODE_MODULE="$(cat mw-node-modules.txt)" KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true KUI_LAUNCHER=$PWD/bin/codeflare PLATFORM=mac ARCH=x64 kui-build-electron
scripts.build:electron:mac:arm64: KUI_KEEP_NODE_MODULE="$(cat mw-node-modules.txt)" KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true KUI_LAUNCHER=$PWD/bin/codeflare PLATFORM=mac ARCH=arm64 kui-build-electron
scripts.build:electron:osx:amd64: KUI_KEEP_NODE_MODULE="$(cat mw-node-modules.txt)" KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true KUI_LAUNCHER=$PWD/bin/codeflare npm run build:electron:mac:amd64
scripts.build:electron:osx:arm64: KUI_KEEP_NODE_MODULE="$(cat mw-node-modules.txt)" KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true KUI_LAUNCHER=$PWD/bin/codeflare npm run build:electron:mac:arm64
scripts.build:electron:linux:amd64: KUI_KEEP_NODE_MODULE="$(cat mw-node-modules.txt)" KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true KUI_LAUNCHER=$PWD/bin/codeflare PLATFORM=linux ARCH=x64 kui-build-electron
scripts.build:electron:linux:arm64: KUI_KEEP_NODE_MODULE="$(cat mw-node-modules.txt)" KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true KUI_LAUNCHER=$PWD/bin/codeflare PLATFORM=linux ARCH=arm64 kui-build-electron
scripts.build:electron:win32:amd64: KUI_KEEP_NODE_MODULE="$(cat mw-node-modules.txt)" KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true KUI_LAUNCHER=$PWD/bin/codeflare PLATFORM=win32 ARCH=x64 kui-build-electron
scripts.build:electron:windows:amd64: KUI_KEEP_NODE_MODULE="$(cat mw-node-modules.txt)" KUI_HEADLESS_WEBPACK=true KUI_LAUNCHER=$PWD/bin/codeflare PLATFORM=win32 ARCH=x64 kui-build-electron
